name: He Never Left
description:
He Never Left is a short horror game where your only goal is to escape a weird place. Or is it?

Game Info

Adventure out in the weird place that the demon brought you into.  Find notes about your past. Try to find a way out... if there even is one.

Features:

  • well-written story
  • puzzles
  • a scary atmosphere
  •  spooky jump scares.
Controls W A S D
MoveMouseLookEInteractTABView notes Credits

Programming by Tudypie and The Captain Moo

3D Models by Tudypie and The Captain Moo

JustCreate - Low Poly House Interior

Music by The Captain Moo

Level design by Tudypie

Twitter: tudypie1 , moo captain

Additional Info

This game was made in a week for Scream Jam 2021. Any feedback is appreciated :)

IMPORTANT If you are playing the game on a wide monitor or on a 4:3 monitor the UI will not appear correctly! I am sorry for that!

If you want to support me in making more indie horror games you can donate here: Buy Me a Coffee
